rules.title: Computer Won't Start
rules.description: Computer doesn't power on at all
rules.solution:
1. Check power cable connection
2. Verify power outlet works
3. Check power supply switch
4. Test with different power cable

rules.title: Blue Screen of Death
rules.description: Computer crashes with blue screen error
rules.solution:
1. Note error code
2. Check recent software/hardware changes
3. Run memory diagnostic
4. Update driver
5. Check for overheating

rules.title: Slow Performance
rules.solution:
1. Run antivirus scan
2. Check startup programs
3. Clean temporary files
4. Add more RAM if needed
5. Defragment hard drive

rules.title: Internet connection Issue
rules.solution:
1. Check cable connection
2. Restart router/modem
3. Run network troubleshooter
4. Update network drivers
5. Reset network settings

rules.title: Overheating Issue
rules.description: Computer gets too hot and shuts down
rules.solution:
1. Clean dust from vents and fans
2. Check thermal paste
3. Ensure proper ventilation
4. Check fan functionality
5. Reduce CPU load
